pkgmetadata.longdescription: Produce R Functions to Create HTML Forms Based on SQL Meta Data // Offers meta programming style tools to generate configurable R functions that produce HTML forms based on table input and SQL meta data. Also generates functions for collecting the parameters of those HTML forms after they are submitted. Useful for quickly generating HTML forms based on existing SQL tables. To use the resultant functions, the output files containing those functions must be read into the R environment (perhaps using base::source()).
